name: Chroma (itch) (Vale)
description:
This is a simple platformer where you can use colors to find your path forward. This game is very much in it's early stages of development, but expect future builds to contain many more levels and nuances, and to perhaps shift the gameplay.

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to move, space to jump, and WASD to use your colors.

This is the first game I'm actually spending time on and trying to make decent. All the assets are my own, sprites, music, effects, etc. Would appreciate all comments, both positive and negative.
